content:
ActiveDirectorySiteLink Class

Definition

The ActiveDirectorySiteLink class represents a set of two or more sites that can be scheduled, for replication, to communicate at uniform cost and through a particular transport.

In this Article

public class ActiveDirectorySiteLink : IDisposable
Inheritance
System.Object
ActiveDirectorySiteLink

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Constructors

ActiveDirectorySiteLink(DirectoryContext,String)

Initializes a new instance of the ActiveDirectorySiteLink class using the specified DirectoryContext object and name.

public ActiveDirectorySiteLink (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteLinkName);
context
DirectoryContext

An DirectoryContext object for creating this site link.

siteLinkName
String

The name for the site link.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons.

  • The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.

  • siteLinkName is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

context or siteLinkName is null.

AuthenticationException

The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

Remarks

The default transport type is RPC.

ActiveDirectorySiteLink(DirectoryContext,String,ActiveDirectoryTransportType)

Initializes a new instance of the ActiveDirectorySiteLink class using the specified DirectoryContext object, name, and transport type.

public ActiveDirectorySiteLink (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteLinkName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType transport);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object for creating this site link.

siteLinkName
String

The name for the site link.

transport
ActiveDirectoryTransportType

An ActiveDirectoryTransportType object that specifies the transport type.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons.

  • The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.

  • siteLinkName is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

context parameter or siteLinkName is null.

AuthenticationException

The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

InvalidEnumArgumentException

transport is not a valid ActiveDirectoryTransportType value.

NotSupportedException

The transport type is not supported.

ActiveDirectorySiteLink(DirectoryContext,String,ActiveDirectoryTransportType,ActiveDirectorySchedule)

Initializes a new instance of the ActiveDirectorySiteLink class using the specified DirectoryContext object, name, transport type, and replication schedule.

public ActiveDirectorySiteLink (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteLinkName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType transport, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchedule schedule);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object for creating this site link.

siteLinkName
String

The name for the site link.

transport
ActiveDirectoryTransportType

An ActiveDirectoryTransportType object that specifies the transport type.

schedule
ActiveDirectorySchedule

An ActiveDirectorySchedule object that specifies the replication schedule for this site link.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons.

  • The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.

  • siteLinkName is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

context or the siteLinkName is null.

AuthenticationException

The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

InvalidEnumArgumentException

transport is not a valid ActiveDirectoryTransportType value.

NotSupportedException

The transport type is not supported.

Properties

Cost

Gets or sets the site link cost.

public int Cost { get; set; }
Value
Int32

A cost that is associated with this site link. The default value is 100.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

An Active Directory Domain Services operation failed. See the exception for details.

ArgumentException

The cost is less than zero. (applies to set only)

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

DataCompressionEnabled

Gets or sets the data compression mode of the site link.

public bool DataCompressionEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if data compression mode is enabled; false if data compression is disabled.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

An Active Directory Domain Services operation failed. See the exception for details.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

InterSiteReplicationSchedule

Gets or sets the ActiveDirectorySchedule object for the current site link object.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchedule InterSiteReplicationSchedule { get; set; }
Value
ActiveDirectorySchedule

Gets or sets the ActiveDirectorySchedule object for the current site link object. Setting this property changes the replication schedule for the site link.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

An Active Directory Domain Services operation failed. See the exception for details.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Name

Gets the name of the site link.

public string Name { get; }
Value
String

The name of the site link.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

NotificationEnabled

Gets or sets a value indicating whether notifications are enabled.

public bool NotificationEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if notifications are enabled; false if notifications are disabled.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

An Active Directory Domain Services operation failed. See the exception for details.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

ReciprocalReplicationEnabled

Gets or sets the mode for reciprocal replication between sites.

public bool ReciprocalReplicationEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if reciprocal replication is enabled; false if reciprocal replication is disabled.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

An Active Directory Domain Services operation failed. See the exception for details.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

ReplicationInterval

Gets or sets the replication interval between sites.

public TimeSpan ReplicationInterval { get; set; }
Value
TimeSpan

The replication interval between sites.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

Invalid ReplicationInterval specified.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Sites

Gets a read/write collection of sites that this site link contains.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteCollection Sites { get; }
Value
ActiveDirectorySiteCollection

A writable ActiveDirectorySiteCollection collection of sites that this site link contains. Sites can be added and deleted from this collection.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

An Active Directory Domain Services operation failed. See the exception for details.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

TransportType

Gets the transport type of the site link.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType TransportType { get; }
Value
ActiveDirectoryTransportType

An ActiveDirectoryTransportType value indicating the transport type of this site link.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Methods

Delete()

Deletes the current site link.

public void Delete ();
Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySiteLink object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Dispose()

Releases all resources used by the object.

public void Dispose ();

Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
disposing
Boolean

true if the managed resources should be released; false if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

FindByName(DirectoryContext,String)

Returns a site link based on a site link name.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink FindByName (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteLinkName);
context
DirectoryContext

An DirectoryContext object that is valid for this site link.

siteLinkName
String

The name of the site link to find.

Returns
ActiveDirectorySiteLink

An ActiveDirectorySiteLink object for the requested site link.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

The site could not be found for the given siteLinkName in the context specified.

ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any one of the following reasons:

  • The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.

  • siteLinkName is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

context or siteLinkName is null.

AuthenticationException

The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

FindByName(DirectoryContext,String,ActiveDirectoryTransportType)

Returns a site link based on a site link name and transport.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink FindByName (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteLinkName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType transport);
context
DirectoryContext

An DirectoryContext object that is valid for this site link.

siteLinkName
String

The name of the site link to find.

transport
ActiveDirectoryTransportType

An ActiveDirectoryTransportType object that specifies the transport type.

Returns
ActiveDirectorySiteLink

An ActiveDirectorySiteLink object for the requested site link.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

The site could not be found for the given siteLinkName in the context specified.

ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any one of the following reasons:

  • The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.

  • siteLinkName is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

context or siteLinkName is null.

InvalidEnumArgumentException

The transport parameter is not a valid ActiveDirectoryTransportType value.

NotSupportedException

The transport type is not supported.

AuthenticationException

The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

GetDirectoryEntry()

Gets the DirectoryEntry for this object.

public System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry ();
Returns
DirectoryEntry

The DirectoryEntry object for this site link.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySiteLink object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Save()

Writes any changes to the object to the Active Directory Domain Services store.

public void Save ();
Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectExistsException

The site object already exists.

ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Remarks

The object must contain at least one site or the operation will fail.

ToString()

Returns the site link name.

public override string ToString ();
Returns
String

A string that contains the name of the site link.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.
